page.title: 02POPULATION AND LAND USE.
page.content: In the area there are{694}people who are over 18 years of age and able to vote.There is a total of{354}houses in the block.Grassland is the primary land cover,used for either silage or grazing,followed by other crops such as oil seed rape,wheat,corn or peas. Most of the animals we saw were sheep, horses and cattle (bullocks or cows), and were grazing on the grass.The {River Aln}runs through parts of the block.On the next page{(Page 3)}there is a list showing the amount of houses and where they are situated.
